# Application Readiness Quiz

## Purpose
This quiz will help you confirm that you've properly completed all required application components before submission.

## Instructions
Check each item to verify your application materials are complete and properly formatted.

### Résumé Verification
- [ ] Contact information is complete (name, phone, email, address)
- [ ] Education section includes all relevant information
- [ ] Experience section details responsibilities and achievements
- [ ] Skills section highlights relevant abilities
- [ ] All sections use consistent formatting

### Cover Letter Check
- [ ] Proper salutation is used (Dear Admissions Committee, Dear [Specific Name], etc.)
- [ ] Letter follows standard business format
- [ ] Content addresses why you're a good fit for the institution

### Personal Statement Review
- [ ] Word count falls within required limits (typically 500-650 words)
- [ ] Statement clearly addresses the prompt
- [ ] Content is free of grammatical and spelling errors

Click "Submit" when you've verified all components.
explanation: Error in comparison process: maximum recursion depth exceeded while calling a Python object. Using most structurally complete version as fallback.
